events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has classified this case under the 'Refund' category based on the customer's message.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling and support.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can proceed with the refund?
My order number is 12345678. I have attached a photo showing that I received a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund process. I will send the item back with the label provided.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the return label has been emailed to you. Thank you for your cooperation.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and returned the item without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we will consider the issue resolved and close this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is important to us.
